content: needles and long tail or your favorite stretchy method loosely cast on cast on 168 180 192 stitches cowl border round 1 place unique stitch marker to mark beginning of round knit to end of round be careful not to twist stitches round 2 purl round 3 knit round 4 purl round 5 knit round 6 purl round 7 knit round 8 purl round 9 remove unique sm switch to 3 25mm 24 inch needles k to end of round proceed to cowl section cowl round 10 place unique sm to mark beginning of round k to end of round round 11 k to end of round repeat round 11 until your work measures 4 50 inches from cast on edge do not remove unique stitch marker proceed to body section body round 12 k81 87 93 place sm k6 6 6 place sm k81 87 93 sts to end of round round 13 *k to one st before sm rli k to one st after sm lli repeat from * once more k to end of round round 14 k to end of round repeat rounds 13 and 14 ninety times more try on poncho and knit until length is three inches to desired length reserve 420 to 475 meters of yarn for bottom border work round 13 once more proceed to bottom border section bottom border remove unique sm and turn work you will now work row back and forth to form side slit with wrong side facing and smaller needles work as follows sl1k k1 kfb *k to one st before sm p1 slip sm p1 repeat from * once more k to last 3 sts kfb k2 turn work and proceed as follows row 1 sl1k *k to one st before sm rli k to one st after sm lli repeat from * once more k to end of row row 2 sl1k *k to one st before sm p1 slip sm p1 repeat from * once more k to end of row work row 1 and 2 twenty times more work row 1 once more cast off loosely as follows k1 *k1 pass first stitch on right needle over second stitch on right needle repeat from * to last stitch remove two remaining sms as you
